mapper.select: SELECT SEQ as seq, EMAIL as email, WRITER as writer, TITLE as title, CONTENTS as contents, STARTTIME as starttime, ENDTIME as endtime, REGTIME as regtime, UPTIME as uptime FROM SCHEDULE_VIEW WHERE (TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(ENDTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) AND TO_DAYS(ENDTIME)) AND ETCYN = 'Y' ORDER BY STARTTIME ASC

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(s.SEQ) FROM SCHEDULE_VIEW s WHERE s.WRITER = e.NAME AND (TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(ENDTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) AND TO_DAYS(ENDTIME)) AND s.ETCYN = 'Y' )as cnt, e.NAME as name, e.EMAIL as email FROM EMPLOYEE e
